FuncDef:
The mpls-tp meg command creates a maintenance entity group (MEG) and displays the MEG view.
The undo mpls-tp meg command deletes a MEG.
By default, no MEG is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a MEG.
The value is a string of 1 to 14 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
MPLS-TP OAM is configured for a maintenance entity (ME). An ME consists of two MEPs on both ends of a transport path. MPLS-TP OAM detects faults in the ME between the MEPs.
One or more MEs using a single transport path belong to a MEG. The mpls-tp meg command must be run to create a MEG before OAM is able to monitor an MPLS-TP network.
Configuration Impact
After the undo mpls-tp meg command is run to delete a MEG, all configurations for the MEG are deleted.
Precautions
If MPLS-TP OAM is already associated with an APS tunnel protection group, a MEG cannot be deleted.
